## Why display matters

```{r}
div(
  div(
    .style %>%
      border("blue"),
    "block"
  ),
  div(
    .style %>%
      border("blue"),
    "block"
  )
)
```

```{r}
div(
  div(
    .style %>%
      border("blue") %>%
      display("inline"),
    "inline"
  ),
  div(
    .style %>%
      border("blue") %>%
      display("inline"),
    "inline"
  )
)
```
